import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Insights } from "../types/insights"; import { AlertTriangle, TrendingUp, TrendingDown, Activity, Database, Clock, Users, BarChart3, PieChart, AlertCircle, CheckCircle, XCircle, Info, Zap, Target, Filter, RefreshCw, } from "lucide-react"; interface ErrorAnalysisProps { insights: Insights; } const ErrorAnalysis: React.FC = ({ insights }) => { const [selectedTimeRange, setSelectedTimeRange] = useState("24h"); const [selectedSeverity, setSelectedSeverity] = useState("all"); const getSeverityColor = (severity: string) => { switch (severity) { case "critical": return "bg-error-100 text-error-800 border-error-200"; case "high": return "bg-warning-100 text-warning-800 border-warning-200"; case "medium": return "bg-info-100 text-info-800 border-info-200"; case "low": return "bg-success-100 text-success-800 border-success-200"; default: return "bg-neutral-100 text-neutral-800 border-neutral-200"; } }; const getSeverityIcon = (severity: string) => { switch (severity) { case "critical": return ; case "high": return ; case "medium": return ; case "low": return ; default: return ; } }; const formatNumber = (num: number, decimals: number = 0) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US", { minimumFractionDigits: decimals, maximumFractionDigits: decimals, }).format(num); }; const formatPercentage = (num: number) => { return `${(num * 100).toFixed(1)}%`; }; // Calculate error metrics const errorMetrics = { totalErrors: insights.severity_context.overall_metrics.error_events, criticalErrors: insights.severity_context.overall_metrics.critical_events, errorRate: insights.severity_context.overall_metrics.overall_error_rate, criticalRate: insights.severity_context.overall_metrics.critical_rate, servicesWithErrors: insights.severity_context.error_rates.services_with_errors, totalServices: insights.severity_context.error_rates.total_services, serviceErrorRate: insights.severity_context.error_rates.service_error_rate, eventsPerHour: insights.severity_context.overall_metrics.events_per_hour, timeSpanHours: insights.severity_context.overall_metrics.time_span_hours, }; // Group anomalies by severity const anomaliesBySeverity = insights.top_anomalies.reduce((acc, anomaly) => { acc[anomaly.severity] = (acc[anomaly.severity] || 0) + 1; return acc; }, {} as Record); // Calculate error trends (mock data for demonstration) const errorTrends = { hourlyErrors: Array.from({ length: 24 }, (_, i) => ({ hour: i, errors: Math.floor(Math.random() * errorMetrics.eventsPerHour * 1.5), critical: Math.floor(Math.random() * errorMetrics.eventsPerHour * 0.3), })), dailyTrend: errorMetrics.eventsPerHour > 100 ? "increasing" : "stable", }; return (
{/* Header with Controls */}

Error Analysis

Comprehensive error tracking and incident analysis

{/* Error Overview Cards */}
Total Errors
{formatNumber(errorMetrics.totalErrors)}
{formatPercentage(errorMetrics.errorRate)} error rate
Critical Errors
{formatNumber(errorMetrics.criticalErrors)}
{formatPercentage(errorMetrics.criticalRate)} critical rate
Affected Services
{errorMetrics.servicesWithErrors}/{errorMetrics.totalServices}
{formatPercentage(errorMetrics.serviceErrorRate)} service impact
Error Velocity
{formatNumber(errorMetrics.eventsPerHour)}
errors per hour
{/* Error Severity Distribution */}

Severity Distribution

Breakdown of error severities

{Object.entries(anomaliesBySeverity).map(([severity, count]) => (
{getSeverityIcon(severity)} {severity.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + severity.slice(1)}
{count}
{((count / insights.top_anomalies.length) * 100).toFixed( 1 )} %
))}

Error Trends

24-hour error pattern analysis

Trend Analysis
Error pattern over {errorMetrics.timeSpanHours.toFixed(1)}{" "} hours
{errorTrends.dailyTrend === "increasing" ? "Increasing" : "Stable"}
{formatNumber(errorMetrics.eventsPerHour)}
Avg/Hour
{formatNumber( errorMetrics.criticalErrors / errorMetrics.timeSpanHours, 1 )}
Critical/Hour
{/* Service Error Analysis */}

Service Error Analysis

Error rates by service and component

{Object.entries( insights.severity_context.error_rates.service_error_rates || {} ) .slice(0, 10) .map(([service, rate]) => (
0.5 ? "bg-error-500" : rate > 0.2 ? "bg-warning-500" : rate > 0.1 ? "bg-info-500" : "bg-success-500" }`} >
{service}
Service component
{formatPercentage(rate)}
error rate
))} {Object.keys( insights.severity_context.error_rates.service_error_rates || {} ).length === 0 && (

No service-specific error data available

)}
{/* Recent Critical Incidents */}

Recent Critical Incidents

High-priority anomalies requiring attention

{insights.top_anomalies .filter( (anomaly) => selectedSeverity === "all" || (selectedSeverity === "critical" && anomaly.severity === "critical") || (selectedSeverity === "high" && ["critical", "high"].includes(anomaly.severity)) || (selectedSeverity === "medium" && ["critical", "high", "medium"].includes(anomaly.severity)) ) .slice(0, 5) .map((anomaly, index) => (
{getSeverityIcon(anomaly.severity)}
{anomaly.severity.toUpperCase()} {new Date(anomaly.timestamp).toLocaleString()}

{anomaly.message}

Type: {anomaly.type.replace("_", " ").toUpperCase()}
{anomaly.details && (
{anomaly.details.correlation && ( Correlation:{" "} {(anomaly.details.correlation * 100).toFixed(1)} % )} {anomaly.details.confidence && ( Confidence:{" "} {(anomaly.details.confidence * 100).toFixed(1)}% )}
)}
))} {insights.top_anomalies.length === 0 && (

No critical incidents detected

System is operating normally

)}
{/* Error Analysis Summary */}

Analysis Summary

Key insights and recommendations

Key Findings

{errorMetrics.totalErrors} total errors detected across{" "} {errorMetrics.servicesWithErrors} services
Error rate of{" "} {formatPercentage(errorMetrics.errorRate)}{" "} with{" "} {formatPercentage(errorMetrics.criticalRate)} {" "} critical incidents
Average of{" "} {formatNumber(errorMetrics.eventsPerHour)}{" "} errors per hour over the last{" "} {errorMetrics.timeSpanHours.toFixed(1)}{" "} hours

Recommendations

Monitor services with error rates above{" "} {formatPercentage(0.1)}
Investigate critical incidents for root cause analysis
Set up automated alerts for error rate thresholds
); }; export default ErrorAnalysis;
